name: Vegan Pumpkin Pancakes
description: These Vegan Pumpkin Pancakes are the ultimate Fall breakfast! Bursting with pumpkin pie flavor and so easy to make.
recipeIngredient: 1 cup soy milk (or other plant milk)
2 tablespoons canola oil, melted coconut oil or applesauce
1 1/2 cups all purpose flour OR whole wheat pastry flour

recipeInstructions.text: In a large mixing bowl, whisk together the pumpkin puree, soy milk, water, oil or applesauce, maple syrup and vanilla until smooth and well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large mixing bowl, whisk together the pumpkin puree, soy milk, water, oil or applesauce, maple syrup and vanilla until smooth and well combined.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the flour, baking powder, salt, cinnamon, ginger and nutmeg to the bowl with the wet ingredients, and stir with a large spoon until combined, but do not over mix. A few small lumps are okay.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the flour, baking powder, salt, cinnamon, ginger and nutmeg to the bowl with the wet ingredients, and stir with a large spoon until combined, but do not over mix. A few small lumps are okay.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a large griddle or pan over medium-high heat. Grease the pan or spray with oil unless you have a good nonstick pan. Drop about 1/3 cup of the batter onto the griddle. Cook until bubbles form, then flip and cook until golden brown on the other side, about 1-2 minutes. Repeat with all the remaining batter.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat a large griddle or pan over medium-high heat. Grease the pan or spray with oil unless you have a good nonstick pan. Drop about 1/3 cup of the batter onto the griddle. Cook until bubbles form, then flip and cook until golden brown on the other side, about 1-2 minutes. Repeat with all the remaining batter.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve with vegan whipped cream, pure maple syrup, vegan butter, chopped pecans, vegan caramel or stir in chocolate chips for pumpkin chocolate chip pancakes. Enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: Serve with vegan whipped cream, pure maple syrup, vegan butter, chopped pecans, vegan caramel or stir in chocolate chips for pumpkin chocolate chip pancakes. Enjoy!

keywords: Fall breakfast, pumpkin pancakes, vegan pumpkin pancakes
